alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:07AM CST until January 29 at 6:09AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River near Goodrich affecting Polk, San Jacinto and Liberty Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Riverside affecting San Jacinto, Walker, Trinity and Polk Counties. Trinity River near Moss Bluff affecting Chambers and Liberty Counties. Trinity River at Liberty affecting Liberty County. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Goodrich. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 38.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 36.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Friday was 39.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 39.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 39.3 feet on 04/21/1979. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Trinity River Goodrich 36.0 38.8 Fri 9 am CST 39.0 38.7 30.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 415 AM CST.
